function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate environmental and behavioral interventions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hypochondriacal fears of europeans of catching diseases from native bodies such as malaria, cholera, and dysentery.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Miasma theories explaining disease as resultant from the bad air ’emanating directly from the earth due to heat and humidity.’","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legacy of hypochondria in the development of housing for british colonizers in tropical places.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of informal settlements despite being characterized as degenerate and associated with social and contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Association of poverty, morality, and disease, leading to discriminatory urban planning and design decisions.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ’surgical’ and brutal slum clearance operations in response to contagious diseases outbreaks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Focussing on three very different cities -jerusalem, phnom penh and torontothey reveal how histories of colonial occupation and planning, of postcolonial economic modernization and of entrepreneurial planning geared to promoting competitive global cities have produced conditions germane to the uneven spread and impacts of covid-19.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of health impacts in cities due to urban planning and interventions.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for urban planning to be divisive in interpretations of appropriate spatial interventions, exacerbating social inequality.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of transmission and spread of covid-19 and other pandemics in urban environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate public health infrastructure in the past","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in crowded occupational environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupational exposure to coronavirus based on job tasks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Workers at risk of exposure to sars-cov-2 in the workplace","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to eliminate covid-19 from the workplace","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in the workplace","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly ventilated indoor environments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission in confined and crowded indoor spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing the numbers of air exchanges","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Avoiding air recirculation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Air recirculation can transport infectious contaminants through spaces, leading to the re-entry of virus particles into workstations.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to close recirculation dampers can lead to the distribution of airborne contaminants from one point to others connected to the same system.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of induction units and fan coils with local circulation may lead to the resuspension of virus particles.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient outdoor airflow can contribute to the buildup of infectious contaminants in indoor spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient social distancing among workers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective air filtration leading to airborne transmission of viruses within buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misconceptions about the effectiveness of hepa filters in capturing coronaviruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited use of hepa filters in non-healthcare occupational settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to maintain social distancing in small businesses","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of administrative controls to minimize exposure to sars-cov-2 in workplace environments.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of personal protective equipment ppe to prevent the transmission of contagious diseases in workplace environments.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to use proper ppe","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper fit or seal of respirators","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on outdated guidelines for controlling covid-19 transmission in workplaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of expert team for the implementation of effective control measures in the workplace.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unsanitary conditions in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and air circulation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unidentified symbols and characters could indicate potential security risks or data corruption.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unidentified text content","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of surface hygiene and cleaning protocols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing and overcrowding","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex and ambiguous text with potential security risk in encoded parts.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Text mentions the spread of contagious diseases in built environments at all scales.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious transmission of coronavirus from animal to human","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmentally mediated transmission of covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High occupant density facilitates the accrual of human-associated microorganisms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
